title: Can cafe-au-lait birthmarks fade with time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, Cafe-au-lait ( coffee-with milk) spots most of the time will be a permanent thing, but sometimes can fade over time. So far no malignant changes reported. Unless it is affecting your daily life, like aesthetically unpleasing, you can basically leave it alone, or else, you can opt for laser removal. What medical personnel worries most for cafe-au-lait is that it could be one of the manifestations for severe systemic disease like neurofibromatosis. You should seek medical advices if you have: 6 or more cafe-au-lait spots larger than 5mm in child and larger than 15mm in adult If you are unsure of the diagnosis, do not hesitate to go to nearest clinic for a proper check-up Cafe Au Lait Spots - Emedicine
